title: GALA72 现代舞·Breathe
abstract:
CSSA GALA72 空间站·Live·现代舞·Breathe
2019.4.14 Irving Plaza现场录制版
GALA72 宣传片链接：https://v.qq.com/x/page/f0857j9lsiv.html  
Breathe 预告片链接：https://v.qq.com/x/page/j0857ba0yt4.html 

Breathe
编舞：Kathy Chen，ins@kathyychennn 
舞蹈：Sabrina/Bowen/Maggie/Luna/Haiyun/Grace/Kathy/Qinan
摄影：Xiaoxuan, Iris
项目负责人：Tom
舞台：Rachel
音乐：Fatalism-Ryuichi Sakamoto&Yukihiro, Takahashi Remix, In the Mirror-Lena Raine, Endless Time-Roberto Cacciapaglia 

Close your eyes and imagine: heavy rain is pouring from the sky. You are late, so you run across the street while the stoplights change, and an ambulance, roaring towards you, almost runs you over. You were so lost in thought that you almost didn’t notice. You almost lost everything for the sake of getting there on time.

Suffocating. Is it the humidity or the million things you have to do today? As your mind races towards the edge, you stop in the middle of Times Square and ask yourself: is it all worth it? What truly matters to me?

Breathe is dedicated to the chaos that is modern living, in which the sacred and the profane, and the profound and the banal, are increasingly blended together, and increasingly difficult to tell apart. We all need time to pause and reflect on what truly matters to us. This piece is an interpretation, in dance, of what that process can and should be. 

It begins with a vignette of New York City, followed by an entry into a dreamscape, where the dancers, in duets, act out the internal conflicts, arising from decisions big and small, that threaten to overwhelm us every day. However, after a long struggle, the conflicts eventually resolve. What remains is the inner peace that comes with discovering what truly matters.
comments: 闭眼驻足，试想窗外大雨倾盆。在飞快变化的信号灯下，你正疾驰穿过喧嚣的街道，想要追回失去的时间。救护车扯着嗓子吼个不停，像是要把你吞掉了一般，与你擦肩而过。你是如此的失落，甚至不曾注意到刚刚自己差点失去了最为宝贵的生命，而仅仅只是为了准时。“令人窒息”, 你如是想到。但到底是这潮湿的空气，还是那些堆积如山的工作而令你手足无措呢？陷入沉思，你渐渐的停下步伐，在时代广场的正中央问道：这一切都值得吗？自己想要追寻的，究竟是什么？现代舞作品，“息”，旨在表达：在包含了种种或非凡或平庸，或新奇或陈旧的生活中，人们愈发愈难以辨别内心深处的自我到底想要走向何方。因此人们需要时间停下来思索自己真正想要的是什么，什么对自己真正有意义。这个作品通过舞蹈展示了这一破茧成蝶过程的一种可能性。“息”，将在以纽约市为背景的序幕中展开，随之而来的是意想不到的梦境。舞者将在梦境中以双人舞的形式展现人们内心经历的挣扎与思索，和在生活中的苦苦煎熬。“日暮何以穷途，还有长夜漫漫。”终于，在经历了一些列的磨难和挑战之后，人们重新归于平静，找到了属于他们自己的答案。
